  
INSTALL Pytesserect OCR before starting Patronage Manager App.
Pytesserect OCR : https://github.com/UB-Mannheim/tesseract/wiki
from Windows installation section, choose 64bit or 32bit version as per your computer.
Install with all default options. installation directory should be : "C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\"


If PatronageManager still doesnt work then
1) Replace "allianceChatActive.png", "allianceChatInActive.png", "chat.png" with new snapshots from your game by keeping name, format, cropping size exactly same.
2) in MoE option uncheck "fullscreen" mode.
